mapper.select: SELECT SUM(total_amount) as totalAmount, SUM(order_balance) as orderBalance, SUM(order_arrearage) as orderArrearage FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE order_id = #{orderid}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid} AND advance_flag = '1') AS 'advanceFlag', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid} AND advance_flag = '0' AND service_times = -1) AS 'sumAppt', SUM(total_amount) as totalAmount, SUM(order_balance) as orderBalance, SUM(order_arrearage) as orderArrearage, SUM(service_times) AS remaintimes FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{mid}

SELECT d.order_id as orderId, d.goods_mapping_id as goodsMappingId, d.total_amount as totalAmount, d.order_balance as orderBalance, d.order_arrearage as orderArrearage, d.item_amount as itemAmount, d.item_capital_pool as itemCapitalPool, d.service_times as serviceTimes, d.create_by as "createBy.id", u.`name` as createByName, d.create_date as createDate FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON d.create_by = u.id WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{recid}

SELECT a.rec_id, a.single_reality_price, a.goods_num, a.order_amount, a.total_amount, (a.order_amount - SUM(c.total_amount)) AS "isFre", SUM(c.total_amount) AS "detaiAmount", SUM(c.service_times) as "times"
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details c ON c.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id WHERE a.rec_id =#{recId} GROUP BY a.rec_id
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details SET advance_flag = '0' WHERE goods_mapping_id = #{recid}
